effect_entries.effect:
Held in battle
:   When the holder would take [super-effective]{mechanic:super-effective} []{type:ice}-type damage, it consumes this item to halve the amount of damage taken.
effect_entries.short_effect: Held: Consumed when struck by a super-effective Ice-type attack to halve the damage.

flavor_text_entries.text:
ポケモンに　持たせると
効果バツグンの　こおり技を
受けたとき　威力が　弱まる。

If held by a Pokémon, this Berry will
lessen the damage taken from one
supereffective Ice-type attack.

Se un Pokémon ha questa bacca, l’attacco
superefficace di tipo Ghiaccio del nemico
viene indebolito.

Si la lleva un Pokémon, le sube la Defensa
Especial en un momento de apuro.

Als getragenes Item schwächt diese Beere
sehr effektive Attacken des Angreifers
vom Typ Eis.

Tenue, cette Baie affaiblit une attaque ennemie
super efficace de type Glace.

포켓몬에게 지니게 하면
효과가 뛰어난 얼음 기술을
당했을 때 위력이 약해진다.

ポケモンに　もたせると
こうかばつぐんの　こおり　わざを
うけたとき　いりょくが　よわまる。

Weakens a supereffective Ice-type
attack against the holding Pokémon.

Weakens a supereffective Ice-type
attack against the holding Pokémon.

Tenue, cette Baie affaiblit une attaque
ennemie super efficace de type Glace.

If held by a Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s
supereffective Ice-type attack.

A Poffin ingredient. If held by a
Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s
supereffective Ice-type attack.

A Poffin ingredient. If held by a
Pokémon, it weakens a foe’s
supereffective Ice-type attack.
